alert.note: Alert for Northern Jasper; Northern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 5:56PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Newton and east central Jasper Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 556 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Roganville, or near Jasper, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Newton, Kirbyville, Roganville, Jamestown and Bleakwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
